entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 27 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
